channel.title: David Stile
channel.description: Interesting tidbits and findings from my daily endeavors

item.title: GEW Tokyo
item.description: Reflections on my time at GEW Japan
item.content:encoded:
GEW Japan 2012-12-17 I had a great time attending GEW Japan back in November. I put together an article that was featured on the Impact Japan website. Please go and check it out. My GEW Article Signal to Noise Media Labs 2012-10-02 I started working with Signal to Noise (S2N) this past year. My focus is on interactive media using technologies like Max MSP and sensors (i.e. Arduinos).

Signal-to-Noise Audio Labs is an interdisciplinary research and design collective that makes cool audio stuff. Modeled after the MIT Media Lab and CNMAT at UC Berkeley, weâ€™re a group of scientists, artists, and highly-motivated folks that come together to research, design, perform with, and teach innovative media technologies. Some of the disciplines draw from:
  • Physics
  • Music
  • Acoustics
  • Psychoacoustics
  • Electrical & Mechanical Engineering
  • Cognitive Sciences
  • Biology
  • Architecture
  • Electroacoustics
  • Computer sciences
  • Mathematics
  • Industrial Design
 ]>
